node.title: Q2 3Node Batch is Sold Out! Q3 Pre-registration is Live!
node.excerpt: After Tactical Investing covered our project, the Q2 Titan V2 3Node batch is offically sold out!

node.title: September 1 Community Call Announcement

node.title: We Need a More Inclusive Internet
node.excerpt: Today we are working with partners in the clean energy and network / connectivity to build the solutions that are needed to provide fair and uninterrupted internet access with all corners of the world.

node.title: The need for ThreeFold's neutral internet
node.excerpt: The Internet is no longer the neutral place it used to be. +80% of the Internet capacity is delivered by a handful of companies.

node.title: How ThreeFold offers Data Sovereignty
node.excerpt: ThreeFold is building the engine for an Internet where people can finally be data sovereign.
